mapper.select: select sku_level, wsp_id, sku_id, sku_code, sku_name, wsu_code, wh_id, wo_id, stock_status, balance_qty, in_stock_qty, opening_qty, out_stock_qty, sku_lot1, sku_lot2, sku_lot3, sku_lot4, sku_lot5, sku_lot6, sku_lot7, sku_lot8, sku_lot9, sku_lot10, sku_lot11, sku_lot12, sku_lot13, sku_lot14, sku_lot15, sku_lot16, sku_lot17, sku_lot18, sku_lot19, sku_lot20, sku_lot21, sku_lot22, sku_lot23, sku_lot24, sku_lot25, sku_lot26, sku_lot27, sku_lot28, sku_lot29, sku_lot30 from wms_stock_balance where create_time >= #{startTime} and create_time < #{endTime}
